p: In another study, EO treatments on the radial mycelial growth of Colletotrichum gloeosporioides (the most common plant pathogen in the world, which causes the common postharvest disease called anthracnose, which affects fruit quality, marketability, and shelf-life) was studied by [ 73]. After 10 days of incubation, the edible coating showed a fungicidal effect in vitro.
